item.title: 中国工业部长会见苹果公司蒂姆-库克
item.description: 根据中国工业部发布的声明，中国工业部长周三在北京会见了苹果公司首席执行官蒂姆-库克。【原文：China's industry minister met with Apple CEO Tim Cook in Beijing on Wednesday, according to a statement released by the ministry.】

item.title: 早间竞标美联储暂时重回舞台中心
item.description: Rae Wee 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rae Wee】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：OpenAI 制定五年计划，兑现 1 万亿美元支出承诺
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周三报道，ChatGPT 的所有者 OpenAI 正在开发新的收入来源、建立债务合作关系，并计划进一步筹集资金，作为五年战略的一部分，以支付超过 1 万亿美元的承诺支出。【原文：ChatGPT owner OpenAI is working on new revenue lines, debt partnerships and planning further fundraising as part of a five-year strategy to cover more than $1 trillion in pledged spending, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 洞察力：认识取代印度呼叫中心工作人员的人工智能聊天机器人
item.description: 在这个印度城市的一家初创公司办公室里，开发人员正在对人工智能聊天机器人进行微调，使其能像人类一样说话和发信息。【原文：At a startup office in this Indian city, developers are fine-tuning artificial-intelligence chatbots that talk and message like humans.】

item.title: 富士康认为中国稀土限制措施目前影响有限
item.description: 全球最大的合约电子制造商、台湾富士康董事长刘永好周三表示，中国新宣布的稀土限制措施目前对富士康影响不大。【原文：Taiwan's Foxconn , the world's largest contract electronics maker, sees little impact for now from China's newly announced rare earths curbs, Chairman Young Liu said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 据国家媒体报道，马来西亚将在东盟峰会上与美国讨论行业关税问题
item.description: 据马来西亚国家媒体周三援引贸易部长的话报道，马来西亚将在下周东盟地区集团会议期间与美国商务部长就包括半导体在内的行业关税问题举行会谈。【原文：Malaysia will hold talks with the U.S. secretary of commerce on sectoral tariffs, including on semiconductors, during a meeting of the ASEAN regional bloc next week, Malaysian state media reported on Wednesday, citing the trade minister.】

item.title: Coinbase 以 24.5 亿美元估值投资印度加密货币交易所 CoinDCX
item.description: 加密货币交易所 Coinbase Global 周三表示，它已对 CoinDCX 进行了投资，这家印度加密货币交易所称，其投后估值为 24.5 亿美元。【原文：Cryptocurrency exchange Coinbase Global said on Wednesday it had made an investment in CoinDCX, which the Indian crypto exchange said values it at a post-money valuation of $2.45 billion.】

item.title: 辉瑞首席执行官称美国制药业需要与中国合作
item.description: 辉瑞公司首席执行官阿尔伯特-伯拉（Albert Bourla）周二表示，美国制药业需要与中国制药业合作，在过去十年中，中国制药业的快速发展使其在全球药物开发中的份额跃升至30%。【原文：Pfizer Chief Executive Albert Bourla said on Tuesday that the U.S. pharmaceutical industry needs to collaborate with China’s, where speedy processes have vaulted it to 30% of global drug development over the past decade.】

item.title: 必和必拓的斯莱特里说，澳大利亚必须削减繁文缛节和电力成本，才能在竞争中立于不败之地
item.description: 必和必拓（BHP）澳大利亚负责人杰拉尔丁-斯莱特里（Geraldine Slattery）周三表示，如果澳大利亚希望与其他国家竞争矿业投资资本，就必须加快环境审批，并促进廉价电力的使用。【原文：BHP's head of Australia, Geraldine Slattery, said on Wednesday the country must speed up environmental approvals and boost access to cheap power if it hopes to compete for mining investment capital with other nations.】

item.title: 韩国高官将赴美参加关税谈判，有望取得进展
item.description: 韩国政府周三表示，韩国工业部长和总统政策首席秘书将于周四前往美国，就降低对亚洲国家商品的关税问题进行后续会谈。【原文：South Korea's industry minister and the chief presidential secretary for policy will travel to the United States on Thursday for follow-up talks on lowering tariffs applied to the Asian country's goods, the government said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 独家报道文件显示，富士康竞购德国采埃孚集团股份陷入停滞
item.description: 据路透社看到的文件显示，富士康历时两年收购德国汽车供应商采埃孚集团（ZF Group）旗下一家公司股份的计划上月陷入僵局，原因是估值预期严重不匹配，以及债务负担高于预期。【原文：Foxconn's two-year pursuit of a stake in a unit of German auto supplier ZF Group stalled last month due to a substantial mismatch in valuation expectations and a higher-than-estimated debt pile, according to documents seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 美联储减息押注再成焦点，亚洲股市回升，美元走软
item.description: 受美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔的鸽派言论和华尔街银行业乐观财报的帮助，亚洲股市周三出现试探性反弹，但一触即发的中美贸易紧张局势抑制了风险偏好。【原文：Asian stocks staged a tentative rebound on Wednesday, helped by dovish comments from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell and upbeat bank earnings on Wall Street, though simmering U.S.-China trade tensions kept a lid on risk appetite.】

item.title: 需求疲软、产能过剩，中国通缩压力持续存在
item.description: 中国的通货紧缩压力持续存在，9 月份消费者价格和生产者价格双双下降，这支持了在房地产市场长期低迷和贸易紧张局势打击信心的情况下采取更多政策措施的理由。【原文：Deflationary pressures persisted in China, with both consumer and producer prices falling in September, supporting the case for more policy measures as a prolonged property market slump and trade tensions weigh on confidence.】

item.title: 美元因美联储降息押注和中国贸易紧张局势而承压
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）的言论增强了本月降息的赌注，美元周三早盘处于守势。【原文：The U.S. dollar was on the defensive early on Wednesday after comments from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell bolstered wagers on an interest rate cut this month.】

item.title: 投资者权衡供应过剩前景和中美贸易紧张局势，石油下跌
item.description: 周三早盘，油价下跌，扩大了上一交易日的跌幅，原因是投资者权衡了国际能源署关于2026年供应过剩的警告以及可能损害需求的中美贸易紧张局势。【原文：Oil prices fell in early trade on Wednesday, extending losses from the previous session, as investors weighed the International Energy Agency's warning of a supply surplus in 2026 and U.S.-China trade tensions that could hurt demand.】

item.title: CBA的科明将至少留任澳大利亚最大银行的负责人至2028年
item.description: 澳大利亚联邦银行（Commonwealth Bank of Australia）董事长马特-科明（Matt Comyn）周三表示，澳大利亚联邦银行首席执行官马特-科明（Matt Comyn）将在未来至少三年内继续掌舵这家澳大利亚最大的银行，他将继续领导这家世界上最昂贵的银行之一。【原文：Commonwealth Bank of Australia Chief Executive Matt Comyn will remain at the helm of the country's largest lender for at least the next three years, its chair said on Wednesday, presiding over one of the most expensive banks in the world.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）总裁表示，特朗普关税报复措施的缺乏有助于全球经济增长
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）总裁克里斯塔琳娜-格奥尔基耶娃（Kristalina Georgieva）周二表示，大多数国家决定不对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收的关税进行报复，这是增强全球经济韧性的首要因素之一。【原文：Decisions by most countries to not retaliate against U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs are among the top factors bolstering the global economy's resilience, IMF Managing Director Kristalina Georgieva said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，麦肯齐-斯科特减持 42% 亚马逊股份
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二援引一份监管文件报道，亿万富翁慈善家麦肯齐-斯科特（MacKenzie Scott）自去年以来已将其在亚马逊公司的持股规模减少了 42%。【原文：Billionaire philanthropist MacKenzie Scott has reduced the size of her stake in Amazon.com by 42% since last year, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing a regulatory filing.】

item.title: 研究公司称，9 月份全球电动汽车销量达到创纪录的 210 万辆
item.description: 市场研究公司 Rho Motion 周三表示，受中国需求强劲和美国后期税收减免热潮的推动，9 月份全球全电动汽车和插电式混合动力汽车销量同比增长 26%，达到创纪录的 210 万辆。【原文：Global sales of fully electric and plug-in hybrid vehicles rose 26% in September from a year ago to a record 2.1 million units, driven by strong demand in China and a late U.S. tax-credit rush, market research firm Rho Motion said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 6 月，KKR 支持的 BOND 私人航空公司被指定为庞巴迪 17 亿美元订单的客户
item.description: 本周二，由美国投资公司 KKR 支持的一家新的私人航空公司 BOND 被披露为 6 月份价值 17 亿美元的 50 架庞巴迪私人喷气机和售后服务订单背后的客户。【原文：BOND, a new private aviation company backed by U.S. investment firm KKR , was disclosed on Tuesday as the customer behind a June $1.7 billion order for 50 Bombardier private jets and aftermarket services.】

item.title: 精神航空公司 2027 年扭亏为盈的目标是净收入 2.2 亿美元
item.description: 精神航空公司（Spirit Airlines）周二表示，将在 2027 年底前全面实施其转型计划，届时这家破产的航空公司预计将产生约 2.2 亿美元的净收入。【原文：Spirit Airlines said on Tuesday it will fully implement its transformation plan by the end of 2027, when the bankrupt carrier expects to produce about $220 million in net income.】

item.title: 约会应用 Grindr 确认收到股东的私有化意向
item.description: Grindr 周二证实，公司董事会收到了股东 Ray Zage 和 James Lu 的来信，信中表示有意探讨将这款约会应用私有化的可能性。【原文：Grindr on Tuesday confirmed that its board had received a letter from shareholders Ray Zage and James Lu stating an interest in exploring the possibility of taking the dating app private.】

item.title: 雪佛龙在 Venture Global 申请延长 Plaquemines 液化天然气启动时间的过程中争取发言权
item.description: 雪佛龙周二要求联邦监管机构允许其就 Venture Global 最近提出的延长路易斯安那州 Plaquemines 液化天然气工厂投产时间的请求发表意见。【原文：Chevron on Tuesday asked federal regulators to let it offer an opinion on Venture Global's recent request for more time to commission the Plaquemines LNG plant in Louisiana, at which the U.S. oil major has a long-term sales and purchase agreement that could be affected by any delay.】

item.title: 由于成本缩减，美国移动公司利润猛增三倍
item.description: 墨西哥电信巨头 America Movil 周二报告称，第三季度利润增长了三倍多，业绩符合接受伦敦证券交易所集团（LSEG）调查的分析师的预测，这主要得益于融资成本的大幅下降。【原文：Mexican telecoms giant America Movil on Tuesday reported a more than a threefold jump in third-quarter profit, as results landed in line with the predictions of analysts polled by LSEG, helped by a sharp drop in financing costs.】

item.title: 迪士尼任命内部人士迈克尔-莫里亚蒂为迪士尼体验部财务总监
item.description: 迪士尼周二任命内部人士迈克尔-莫里亚蒂（Michael Moriarty）为财务总监兼迪士尼体验部执行副总裁，接替凯文-兰斯贝里（Kevin Lansberry）。【原文：Disney on Tuesday named insider Michael Moriarty as the finance chief and executive vice president of Disney Experiences, succeeding Kevin Lansberry.】

item.title: Kaiser Permanente 称工人已开始为期五天的罢工
item.description: 医疗保健集团 Kaiser Permanente 周二表示，该公司正面临着医疗保健工会联盟（Alliance of Health Care Unions）因工资问题而发起的罢工，但已制定了不间断继续运营的计划。【原文：Healthcare conglomerate Kaiser Permanente said on Tuesday that it is facing a labor strike called by the Alliance of Health Care Unions over wages, but has plans in place to continue operations without interruption.】

item.title: 澳大利亚监管机构取消西太平洋银行 3.24 亿澳元的资本附加条款
item.description: 澳大利亚审慎监管机构周三表示，在西太平洋银行完成了所需的多年风险转型计划后，该机构已取消了对该行额外增加的 5 亿澳元（3.2415 亿美元）资本。【原文：Australia's prudential regulator said on Wednesday that it has removed the additional A$500 million ($324.15 million) capital add-on on Westpac after the bank completed a required multi-year risk transformation program.】

item.title: Stellantis 将在美国投资 130 亿美元
item.description: Stellantis 于本周二宣布在美国投资 130 亿美元，此举将为市场带来五款新车型，并在未来四年内为美国中西部的工厂增加 5000 个工作岗位。【原文：Stellantis announced a $13 billion investment in the U.S. on Tuesday, a move it said will bring five new models to the market and add 5,000 jobs in plants across the Midwest over the next four years.】

item.title: 中美紧张局势加剧，比特币和以太币下跌，抹去周一涨幅
item.description: 由于中美紧张局势加剧，比特币和以太币周二暴跌，抹去了前一天受唐纳德-特朗普总统和解贸易言论推动的涨势。【原文：Bitcoin and ether tumbled on Tuesday as U.S.-China tension ramped up, wiping out a rally the day before that was fueled by President Donald Trump's conciliatory trade remarks.】

item.title: 交易日：鲍威尔讲话、银行业绩带来宽慰
item.description: 了解推动全球市场的各种力量【原文：Making sense of the forces driving global markets】
